p: Prior to the experiments, the pathogen's inoculum, made up of macroconidia, microconidia and chlamidospores was prepared by scraping off the propagules on 10 days old PDA cultures using glass wire and sterile distilled water. The obtained slurry, was filtered and adjusted to 2×10 5 cell.ml −1 using Mallassez haemocytometer and saline solution (NaCl, 0.09%).
